page.title: 07TRADE IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: ON MANCHESTER ROAD, THE TOWN'S MAIN SHOPPING PRECINCT HAS 3 SUPERMARKETS: - GATEWAY, THE CO-OP AND LIPTONS. THERE ARE ALSO SEVERAL SMALL SHOPS SELLING DAILY FOOD REQUIREMENTS. EVERY TUESDAY AND FRIDAY, THERE IS AN OPEN AIR MARKET SITUATED IN THE CAR PARK NEXT TO THE OLD CINEMA HOUSE (NOW A BINGO HALL) WHICH IS VERY POPULAR WITH LOCAL INHABITANTS. MANY OF THE STALLS OFFER EITHER FRESH VEGETABLES OR CLOTHING. HOWEVER, AS MOST PEOPLE IN STOCKSBRIDGE LIVE ON THE HILLSIDE, THERE ARE SEVERAL SMALL SHOPPING CENTRES ON THE HOUSING ESTATES. FOR PURCHASING CLOTHES, FOOTWEAR, ELECTRICAL GOODS AND LUXURY ITEMS MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL TO EITHER BARNSLEY OR SHEFFIELD.
